posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge MOUSE GLENN
posts.post_content:
Have been trying to get all six Old Judge variations for Ed "Mouse" Glenn.  Looking to buy the:

194-2 (batting, looking at ball) 
194-4 (catching hands thigh high)

Let me know if you have either available.

Dave
TTT with one card received.  Still looking for these other two
